Contacts.add-contact: Add a contact to start sending them messages or money.
Contacts.input: Input the MIBAN Code or Lightning Address from the new contact.

Dashboard.liquid-explainer: Liquid Bitcoin (L-BTC) is a wrapped version of Bitcoin (BTC) issued by the Liquid Network, a sidechain-based, Bitcoin layer-2 settlement network. It is a 1:1 pegged asset, meaning that one L-BTC is equivalent to one BTC. L-BTC is designed to improve the functionality of Bitcoin transactions, issuance of digital assets, and exchanges.
Dashboard.secure: Please secure your account with a stronger password.
Dashboard.tether-explainer: Tether (USDT) is a stablecoin, a type of cryptocurrency designed to maintain a stable value relative to a fiat currency, in this case, the United States dollar (USD). It is issued by Tether Limited, a company founded in 2014, and is pegged to the value of the US dollar.
Dashboard.warning: In order to send USD you need to add Bitcoin to your wallet.

Settings.no-scan: No QR code scanner? Enter the text below:
Settings.otp: Scan the QR code below with your preferred authenticator app or manually enter the code provided. Once set up, you will need to enter a one-time password (OTP) generated by the app each time you log in.
Settings.pass-confirm: I have saved my password and understand that if I lose it I cannot recover my account and access to my funds will be lost forever.

Settings.decrypt: Decrypt to view your wallet’s secret mnemonic.
Settings.miban: Share this code with other people to receive payments.
Settings.name: Wallet Name
Settings.tech-info: Technical information about your wallet, helpful for advanced recovery.

Setup.input: Input a 12 or 24 word mnemonic to restore the wallet.
Setup.no-sensitive: The wallet will be created on your device. No sensitive information is stored on the server.
Setup.start: Setup your first wallet to start your journey.

Vault.seed: Your seed phrase is encrypted with your password.

Wallet.receive-warn: Please do not send to this address more than once or after 24 hours from generation.
Wallet.send-options: MIBAN Code, Lightning Invoice, or Payment Address

Common.combo: A combination of letters, numbers and symbols.
Common.private: Keep this phrase private to avoid loss of funds.

Index.beta: Beta - Limit funds and use at your own risk.

404.desc: It looks like the page you were looking for retired early. Let’s get you back on track!

Landing.access: Access global finance in 3 simple steps
Landing.create-account: Create your account with just an email and a password.
Landing.designed: Designed and built to be simple, modern and convenient.
Landing.ease-payments: Receive and send payments with ease. Your BancoLibre account comes with a Lightning Address for simple and quick transactions.
Landing.experience: Experience the future of banking with BancoLibre
Landing.generate-miban: Generate a MIBAN code to chat and receive payments.
Landing.hero-sub-one: Pay and get paid in dollars and bitcoin.
Landing.hero-sub-two: Simple, secure and always in your control.
Landing.join: Join BancoLibre today and take control of your financial future.
Landing.no-parties: No third parties can access or control your funds without your explicit permission.
Landing.receive-dollars: Receive dollars or bitcoin in seconds. Find safety in stability of the dollar while gaining access to the upside of bitcoin.
Landing.send-messages: Send encrypted messages to your contacts securely through BancoLibre.
Landing.user-friendly: BancoLibre is designed to be user-friendly and secure. No complicated hoops to jump through. Banking made easy for everyone.

Login.2fa: Your account is enabled with two-factor authentication. Use a method below to authenticate your identity.
Login.code: Enter the code from your authenticator app
Login.secure: Your account is secured with an authentication code. Open up the Authenticator app and enter the code here.

Recover.description: If you know your encrypted mnemonic, it can be decrypted in combination with email, password and symmetric key.

Signup.accept-password: I understand that if I forget the password my account cannot be recovered.
Signup.accept-terms: By checking this box you agree to the <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and the <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.
Signup.important: Important: Your account cannot be recovered if you forget it!
Signup.invite: If you have an invite code please enter to complete the signup process.
Signup.plain: The password hint will be stored in plain text. Avoid using your full password as a hint!
Signup.save: Please save your password as it cannot be recovered if lost.
Signup.security: The password is your responsibility to keep safe. You may want to consider using a password manager. <learn>Learn more</learn> about BancoLibre security practices.

Success.waitlist-desc: You're one step closer to experiencing BancoLibre. We'll notify you as soon as we're ready for you.

Waitlist.good-things: Good things take time. We’d love for you to be the first to know when we’re live!
Waitlist.notify: We'll notify you as soon as we're ready for you.
